**Branch naming:** Please use the pattern `launch_<launch_number>_task_<task_number>` (e.g., `launch_1_task_1`).
**Closing issues:** In the PR body, use `Closes #<issue_number>` where `<issue_number>` matches the task number in your branch name (e.g., `task_1` â†’ `Closes #1`).
